betterquesting:10.desc:8:
the §6Purification Chamber§r allows you to §epurify ores to get it's clumps§r. This is a crucial step to the Tier 2 Ore Processing line. The Purification Chamber often needs you to §efeed it §6Oxygen§r in order to §epurify the input§r.

This machine also has a factory variant, this means your Ore Processing line can be much faster with the help of bulk-tasking.

To craft one, you'll need four §6Enriched Alloy§rs, two §6Advanced Circuit§rs, two §6Osmium Ingot§rs, and an §6Enrichment Chamber§r.
